passives.name: Cleansing Flame
passives.effects:
Inflicting an enemy champion with a {{as|Burn|buzzword3}} effect releases a fireball from the target, landing to a location near you after {{fd|0.5}} seconds. Upon landing, a blaze is created at the impact area with a radius of 175 units, lasting for 5 seconds (3 second cooldown per target). While you are within the blaze, gain {{as|20% '''bonus total''' movement speed}}, lingering for {{fd|0.75}} seconds after exiting, and {{tip|heal}} for {{pp|60 to 150}} upon entering and each second of the blaze's lifetime thereafter. While enemies are within the blaze, they are dealt {{as|100 magic damage}} every second.

For each unique {{as|Burn|buzzword3}} effect source that you have, up to 10, increase the blaze's size by 40 units, and its strength by {{as|4% '''bonus total''' movement speed}} and {{as|30|hsp}} healing per second for the buff and {{as|60 magic damage}} per tick for the enemy effect.
